original: Milindapañha
Vicāravagga
8. Phassalakkhaṇapañha
Rājā āha—
“bhante nāgasena, yattha manoviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, phassopi vedanāpi tattha uppajjatī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena yattha manaḥ viññāṇam uppajjati phassaḥ api vedanā api tattha uppajjati iti

original: “Āma, mahārāja, yattha manoviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, phassopi tattha uppajjati, vedanāpi
analyzed: āma mahā rāja yattha manaḥ viññāṇam uppajjati phassaḥ api tattha uppajjati vedanā api

original: tattha uppajjati, saññāpi tattha uppajjati, cetanāpi tattha uppajjati, vitakkopi
analyzed: tattha uppajjati saññā api tattha uppajjati cetanā api tattha uppajjati vitakko pi

original: tattha uppajjati, vicāropi tattha uppajjati, sabbepi phassappamukhā dhammā tattha uppajjantī”ti.
analyzed: tattha uppajjati vicāraḥ api tattha uppajjati sabbe pi phassa pamukhā dhammā tattha uppajjanti iti

original: “Bhante nāgasena, kiṁlakkhaṇo phasso”ti?
“Phusanalakkhaṇo, mahārāja, phasso”ti.
analyzed: phusana lakkhaṇaḥ mahā rāja phassaḥ ti

original: “Opammaṁ karohī”ti.
“Yathā, mahārāja, dve meṇḍā yujjheyyuṁ, tesu yathā eko meṇḍo, evaṁ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja dve meṇḍāḥ yujjheyyu tesu yathā ekaḥ meṇḍaḥ evam cakkhu daṭṭhabba

original: Yathā dutiyo meṇḍo, evaṁ rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
Yathā tesaṁ sannipāto, evaṁ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
analyzed: yathā tesam sannipātaḥ evam phassaḥ daṭṭhabbo ti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
“Yathā, mahārāja, dve pāṇī vajjeyyuṁ, tesu yathā eko pāṇi, evaṁ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja dve pāṇī vajjeyyu tesu yathā ekaḥ pāṇi evam cakkhu daṭṭhabba

original: Yathā dutiyo pāṇi, evaṁ rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
Yathā tesaṁ sannipāto, evaṁ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
analyzed: yathā tesam sannipātaḥ evam phassaḥ daṭṭhabbo ti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
“Yathā, mahārāja, dve sammā vajjeyyuṁ, tesu yathā eko sammo, evaṁ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja dve sammā vajjeyyu tesu yathā ekaḥ sammaḥ evam cakkhu daṭṭhabba

original: Yathā dutiyo sammo, evaṁ rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
Yathā tesaṁ sannipāto, evaṁ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
analyzed: yathā tesam sannipātaḥ evam phassaḥ daṭṭhabbo ti

original: “Kallosi, bhante nāgasenā”ti.
Phassalakkhaṇapañho aṭṭhamo.
